full_summary:
**Title:** Stage 1 - TCH Rock Slope Remediation – Glacier National Park
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01031267
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-31
**Closing Date:** 2023-04-18, 16:00 (Eastern Time)

Parks Canada invites contractors to submit a bid for the Stage 1 TCH Rock Slope Remediation project at Glacier National Park. The project involves rock slope remediation work along the Trans-Canada Highway, including:

* Danger tree removal
* Rock scaling
* Trim blasting
* Rock bolting
* Ditch excavation

Work is to be completed at Heather Hill (km 0+317 to km 1+767) and Beaver Hill (km 12+097 to km 12+992).

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their bid via fax or email to the specified contact. The email address for responses to bid solicitations is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Bids submitted by postal mail or courier will not be accepted.

The attachment size limit is 15 megabytes. Bidders are responsible for any issues related to transmission or receipt of the emailed bid due to file size. If the email size is too large, bidders should send the bid in multiple emails, properly labeled with the solicitation number, project name, and number of emails included.

**Evaluation Process:**

This is a two-stage selection process. Bidders will submit a bid in two stages. Stage 1 will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers, while Stage 2 will invite qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Project Requirements:**

Bidders must familiarize themselves with National Parks Regulations and complete the work in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

**Additional Information:**

Bidders can obtain documents and specifications from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Addenda, when issued, will be available on the same platform.

* Region: British Columbia
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Value: $500,001 to $1,000,000
* Period of Contract: October 31, 2023, or as per the solicitation document.

For further information or inquiries, please contact Jennifer Maheu at jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca
